commandDescription: print a greeting and your org IDs
deactivateFlagDescription: email address of user to be deactivated
activateFlagDescription: email address of user to be activated
accountFlagDescription: email address of user to add/remove Click license.
modeFlagDescription: add or remove - indicate whether add or remove Click license from user.
fieldFlagDescription: API name of the email field to update.
errorNoUsers: User '%s' cannot be found.  Please check the user email address.
errorCannotUpdateStatus: The current status of user '%s' is '%s'.  Please provide another user email address.
errorNoLicenseToRemove: No Click License to remove for user '%s'
errorCannotAddClickLicense: User '%s' already has Click Lisense assigned.
